This repository provides a minimalist i3 Window Manager setup with automated theming based on wallpapers using Material 3 color palettes. It includes a complete configuration for essential tools like Eww, Alacritty, Fish, and Rofi, all integrated and themed for a cohesive desktop experience.

MentraOS is an open-source operating system and SDK for smart glasses, enabling hands-free interaction with AI, streaming, transcription, and photo capture on compatible devices. It supports a range of smart glasses and offers a developer console and app store for extending functionality.

ğŸ“ ğ—”ğ—•ğ—¢ğ—¨ğ—§ ğ—§ğ—›ğ—œğ—¦ ğ—£ğ—¥ğ—¢ğ—ğ—˜ğ—–ğ—§

MarkText is a free, open-source, and minimalist markdown editor focused on speed and usability. It offers a distraction-free writing experience with a real-time, in-line WYSIWYG preview and support for CommonMark and GitHub Flavored Markdown specifications. This fork aims to modernize the editor for contemporary macOS, Windows, and Linux systems.

ğŸ“ ğ—”ğ—•ğ—¢ğ—¨ğ—§ ğ—§ğ—›ğ—œğ—¦ ğ—£ğ—¥ğ—¢ğ—ğ—˜ğ—–ğ—§

Text Grab is a C# Windows utility that uses Optical Character Recognition (OCR) to extract text from any visible content on the screen. It leverages the Windows API for local OCR processing, allowing users to copy text from images, videos, or application elements that don't support text selection. The application offers multiple modes for flexible text grabbing.
